text: Push operation on stack: Let, n be the maximum size of stack and p be the element to be inserted onto the stack s. Push(s, Top, n, p) { if(Top==n-1) { printf(“stack overflow”); exit(1); } Top ++; S[Top] = p; //element p inserted on top of the stack } Pop operation of stack: Let n be the maximum size of stack and p be the variable which will contain the value of top of the stack. Pop(s, Top, n) { int p; If(Top = = -1) { printf(“under flow condition”); exit(1); } p = s[Top]; Top - - return(p); }
